sentences.en: Being tall can make you feel incredibly self-confident.
sentences.cn: 个子高会使你感觉极其自信。

sentences.en: He is always suntanned and incredibly fit.
sentences.cn: 他总是皮肤黝黑，无比健康。

sentences.en: He is incredibly lucky to be alive.
Her eyes were large and brown and fringed with incredibly long lashes.
sentences.cn: 她有一双褐色的大眼睛，睫毛特别长。

sentences.en: I couldn't decide whether he was incredibly brave or just insane.
sentences.cn: 我不能判定他到底是英勇无畏还是精神失常。

sentences.en: I felt incredibly ashamed of myself for getting so angry.
sentences.cn: 我对自己发那么大的火而深感惭愧。

sentences.en: I was incredibly hyper. I couldn't sleep.
sentences.cn: 我太亢奋了，根本无法入睡。

sentences.en: Incredibly, she had no idea what was going on.
sentences.cn: 令人难以置信的是，她当时对发生的事一无所知。

sentences.en: Incredibly, some people don't like the name.
sentences.cn: 不可思议的是，有些人不喜欢这个名字。

sentences.en: Irene is so incredibly musical and has a natural instinct to perform.
sentences.cn: 艾琳有着极高的音乐天分和天生的表演才能。
那是个极其艰苦的工作。
尼古丁很容易让人上瘾。

sentences.en: Paul was incredibly supple and strong.
sentences.cn: 保罗身体极其灵活，而且非常结实。

sentences.en: The idea of weather forecasting developed incredibly quickly.
sentences.cn: 天气预报概念的发展速度快得令人难以置信。

sentences.en: The knife had pierced his heart, but incredibly he was still alive.
sentences.cn: 刀插入了他的心脏，但他还活着，真令人难以置信。

sentences.en: Tina Turner shimmied across the stage in an incredibly sexy dress.
sentences.cn: 蒂娜·特纳穿着极其性感的裙子一边跳着希米舞一边穿过舞台。

words.tran_cn: 不能相信；不可信的事物

trans.tran_en: in a way that is hard to believe
